radiographic_examinations.findings: Homogeneously enhancing infundibular process involving the optic chiasm, pituitary, and hypothalamus with T2/fluid-attenuated inversion recovery hyperintensity in the basal ganglia and surrounding subcortical white matter.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Return of nodular enhancement in the left optic nerve 7 weeks after initial follow-up.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Did not demonstrate hilar lymphadenopathy or other findings concerning for tuberculosis or sarcoidosis.
Did not find hilar lymphadenopathy or areas of increased uptake outside the CNS.
